metadata.title: CVE-2017-12874 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
The InfoCard module 1.0 for SimpleSAMLphp allows attackers to spoof XMLmessages by leveraging an incorrect check of return values in signaturevalidation utilities.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-12874` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

simplesamlphp - 1.14.15-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: simplesamlphp package in jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '1.14.15-1').
